titles.title: All Glory, Laud, and Honor (Theodulph of Orleans)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All glory, laud, and honor to Thee, Redeemer, King To whom the lips of children made sweet hosannas Ring. Thou art the King of Israel, Thou David’s royal Son, Who in the Lord’s name comest, the King and Blessed One.{/lang-eng}
